body_html: I checked the problem again using the nightly build on Windows and Linux, too, and both of them produce the same error. Furthermore, I've started to think, that this problem may also be the reason, why tf.keras.utils.multi_gpu_model produces a model which cannot be trained with the estimators eventhough no pre-trained weights are used - at least the error message looks very similar.

body: I checked the problem again using the nightly build on Windows and Linux, too, and both of them produce the same error. Furthermore, I've started to think, that this problem may also be the reason, why `tf.keras.utils.multi_gpu_model` produces a model which cannot be trained with the estimators eventhough no pre-trained weights are used - at least the error message looks very similar.
